name: upstash
title: Upstash
description: Displays a list of the Upstash products you use in the menu bar.
author: ademilter

commands.name: upstash
commands.title: Upstash
commands.description: Displays a list of the Upstash products you use in the menu bar.

preferences.name: email
preferences.title: Email
preferences.description: Please enter your Upstash account email

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Please enter your Upstash API Key

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
